title: New Champion?

embed.description: Truth is never lost. Initiate PROJECT:

body:
Is there a Chance that the new project based skin with no memory trace could be a new champion as the trace is lost 
Some people are speculating that the weapon could be {{champion:58}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:11}}or {{champion:24}} 
these are the main speculations. I doubt that it would be {{champion:58}} I mean he's a Crocodile. {{champion:39}} her weapon is nothing like this. 
{{champion:11}} and {{champion:24}} seem like the two most likely to me. master yi has his q alpha strike similar to the blade,{{champion:24}} on the other hand looks quite similar to the image shared by riot due to having many eyes and some form of hair coming out the top also the weapon itself has no significance to {{champion:24}}. 
But I believe it is most likely that this is a new champion I would like to here others thoughts.


_what if Yone is not dead_

replies.body:
Her weapon may look nothing like the alpha in its current form but if you take a good look there isnt a real handle and it stated that it transforms :3

I had an inkling that tryndamere or fiora would be a possibility, also renekton with his dual blade and braum for the giant shield that features nothing but the shield (so I don't think its Leona or Pantheon).

Everyone should probably realize that the two guns are lucian's "lightcasters"

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=6mA0HErr,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-20T07:57:43.537+0000)
>
> Her weapon may look nothing like the alpha in its current form but if you take a good look there isnt a real handle and it stated that it transforms :3
> 
> I had an inkling that tryndamere or fiora would be a possibility, also renekton with his dual blade and braum for the giant shield that features nothing but the shield (so I don't think its Leona or Pantheon).
> 
> Everyone should probably realize that the two guns are lucian's "lightcasters"

The shield one is for Leona. Braum isn't female...

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=6mA0HErr,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-08-20T08:10:22.239+0000)
>
> The shield one is for Leona. Braum isn't female...

Where does it say that it is for a female?

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=6mA0HErr,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-08-20T09:51:23.871+0000)
>
> Where does it say that it is for a female?

"Brilliance in pieces, shrouded in ethereal flame. Protector, light bringer. Lone voice. Stand and Fight. In death heavy fields, now still **SHE **stands, light washes over..."

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=6mA0HErr,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-20T10:17:05.875+0000)
>
> "Brilliance in pieces, shrouded in ethereal flame. Protector, light bringer. Lone voice. Stand and Fight. In death heavy fields, now still **SHE **stands, light washes over..."

Oh, I didn't see that anywhere. Kudos sir
Transforms as in like all the weapons have different functions aside from slash, like CC or bonus dmg etc hence the transformation type material indicating like actives on the weapon and stuff.

Thinking about it, I agree that it being {{champion:39}} is a little ridiculous. As you pointed out, her weapon looks nothing like the Hyperlight "Alpha".

As for {{champion:58}} it seems a little silly to count him out simply because he's a crocodile, Riot isn't beneath doing that, however I do agree it's unlikely to be him. His blade is more like a Bat'leth (yes, I'm talking about the traditional Klingon blade weapon) than the Hyperlight.

{{champion:24}} to me seems like an unlikely choice, mainly because he usually holds his "weapons" at any point he can grab while he wouldn't be able to do that with the Hyperlight, since it's only got a small area in the middle to hold onto (arguably only able to use one hand).

{{champion:11}} seems even less likely than {{champion:24}}, mainly because of the differences in {{champion:11}}'s usual weapons and the Hyperlight. With {{champion:11}}'s weapons, they only go in the one direction from the hilt. The Hyperlight, however, goes in both directions, clearly a big difference. I'm not ruling him out though.

Looking at some other champions, {{champion:62}} seems a possibility. I know he usually uses staff weapons but they're consistent with the hyperlight in the sense they go both directions from where you hold onto them.

It even seems possible (though unlikely) it could be {{champion:429}} (I know it doesn't seem like a spear weapon but, other than that, it seems to have a few similarities with her spears) or even {{champion:99}} (I know what you're thinking, but Riot have already turned her staff into a gun, do you really think they're going to shy away from turning it into a sword?)

Just my two cents.

I highly doubt it's going to be {{champion:62}} that completely does a complete 180Â° on Wukong's weapon of choice. No other skin departs from that identity of Wukong holding a staff. 
{{champion:24}} more likely is the champion because it states in his lore that he can handle any weapon like a master; his title being "Grandmaster at Arms".

"Alpha" and "Multi-Target" closely aligns to Master Yi's Q ability. 
The transverse double-bladed feature of the weapon could be used for Master Yi's Passive - Double Strike. (I know. It sounds like a complete ability rework; a legendary or ultimate skin).

Other candidates are {{champion:107}} and {{champion:58}}.
Their weapons have similarities with the Hyperlight Blade.
Renekton doesn't match with any of the descriptions of the character, aside from multi-target, but Renekton doesn't target multiple champions, he simply slices and dices people in his immediate range.
Rengar can hold the title of "Alpha" but his weapons (across all skins) has thickness and curvature, this Hyperlight Blade does not  seem to have that. 

I go back to Jax. The weapon handle could extend to give Jax space to hold it with both hands, as he does with every other skin.
____
The seeming nature of the figure's multi-eyed head indicates that it is either {{champion:11}} or {{champion:24}}. You could say that those could simply be reflections of light sources in the vicinity but highly unlikely.

Ok so its master yi seen on the PBE
[](http://read:http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/08/820-pbe-update.html)

Pretty much this. S@20 has updated to include the "Project" skins, which are Fiora, Lucian, Leona and Zed (as expected) accompanied by [Master Yi](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/08/820-pbe-update.html#yi), though he seems to only use the "transformed" blade while his Highlander (ult) is in effect (as well as appearing in a few of his emotes).

If you actually look at the Hyperlight Alpha Blade it has a handle and the word Alpha implies it is for Master Yi - Also, the Teaser on OPL has a face of a Champion that looks a lot like it could be Master Yi.

Riot hasn't confirmed, but it really looks like it is Yi purely because even though the weapon has a blade part sticking out the bottom, it could still be a weapon held like Yi holds his and because it has the word Alpha in its name with no other hints.

6 skins
1) Yasuo {{champion:157}} 
2) Double guns = Lucian {{champion:236}} 
3) Shield =  Leona{{champion:89}}  (shield stuns)
4) Plasma Cut = Irelia {{champion:39}} (single target at multiple angles, 2 blades)
5) Alpha blade = Renekton {{champion:58}} (multi targetted combat)
6) Pulse Saber = Fiora {{champion:114}}  (single target, maximum repel power, lightweight)

L2 read the clues

In addition to the other comments made by the players here:
Jax could be the mystery skin.
He bears the same "hairstyle".
Has multiple eyes.
He warrants having a blade weapon; in his lore it dictates that he can use any type of weapon. Admittedly it would be odd for Jax to have this weapon.
He can multi-stun targets (I guess).

You say learn to read the clues, yet you've either missed this, or missed getting a brain.
Plasma cut have this clue "Dark sight, shadows marked, death lives beside. Silencer, he follows. The shadow is within. Blood soaked, he stands. Vanish..." 
That's obviously NOT Irelia. Definitely Zed.

Also, Alpha, multi target, Yi fits that description way better than Renekton.
Also Yi's headhunter skins lenses are identical to the mystery person on the desktop version of the site you see when you open it, even has a pony tail.

L2 actually read the clues b0ss
L2 not be a dick. you only know cos its already been revealed

It's called **Alpha**. It's for Master Yi.

I've known Riot long enough to get used to the fact that they often lack creativity and are quite blatant a lot of the time.
Riot said they wouldn't be releasing a new champion for a while, highly doubt it.
you cant trust riot they released gromp a few weeks after ekko
They said this after they created Tahm.

there is probably a new champion since the first box at the top in the project site is "missing" cause each weapon of the other boxes have "commentaries" or "Quotes", and it might be yone and because maybe hes a cyborg since its a project but idk might be cool

I honestly don't see how it could possible be Master Yi. The Blade is double sided. It's not just ornamentation. Renekton is possible. Leona covers support, Zed mid, Lucian ADC, Fiora top, so the last is probable a jnglr, though thats far from certain.

Jax seems the most likely since he spins his weapon which refers to the champions ability to take on multiple targets. There was a riot post saying there is not a new champ coming for this project btw. So despite the clear logic behind it being Yone given the same code, unless that was supposed to be a red herring in that Yona is current yasuo and REAL yasuo is being released then no champ is coming.
